title: So many stuff ups with client.
body:
Ive been playing league since beta.. its an amazing game but latley there has been way way way to many issues with my league client. e.g pvp net patcher never connecting once i click on logo so doesnt open.
i finally get in pick my champ then the next loading screen doesnt open due to either firewall issue ( mind you i turn it off when i play league ) or it disconnects from pvp net client. im literally so fed up with all this crap. ive re booted my computer several times the client goes good for a few days and then bam back to square one. any suggestions as im thinking of giving up on league.

replies.body:
>im thinking of giving up on league.

In all honesty, that's the best suggestion. League is an ever changing game, and the methods Riot have employed in executing it are... well they could have done better.

Some things you can try before that, though, are things such as defragmenting your hard-drive, scanning for malicious software, updating all softwares and drivers, running in permanent admin mode or upgrading your computer, if you're willing.

Best of luck.
